Common.Slogan: Strengthening Business Ties Between Portugal and Bangladesh

HomePage.Title: Welcome to CCPB
HomePage.Description: This is the homepage of the Chamber of Commerce Portugal-Bangladesh.

Courasel.0: Our main aim is to enhance trade relation between the two countries: Portugal and Bangladesh. We facilitate and support companies to develop trade and investment and provide access to prospective partners and information to achieve their goal.

0.Title: Expertise in Trade
0.Desc: Expertise on Promoting economic cooperation between the Portugal and the People’s Republic of Bangladesh, articularly in the private and government sector.

1.Title: Enthusiasm for Growth
1.Desc: Sharing and exchange of information between the Portugal with a view to elevate greater understanding about each other’s economic potentials and opportunities.

2.Title: Building Bridges
2.Desc: Organizing meetings, workshops, business luncheon, edutainment seminars, get together to promote and support measures calculated to benefit and protect the interests.

WhoWeAre.Title: Who We Are
WhoWeAre.Desc1: The Chamber of Commerce Portugal-Bangladesh (CCPB) is a bilateral trade organization committed to fostering strong economic and cultural ties between Portugal and Bangladesh. Established as a bridge between the two nations, we work to create opportunities for businesses, professionals, and investors by facilitating trade, investment, and collaboration across diverse sectors. As a recognized hub for Portuguese and Bangladeshi business interests, CCPB brings together a vibrant community of entrepreneurs, industry leaders, and stakeholders.
WhoWeAre.Desc2: We are dedicated to driving mutual growth by providing access to key resources, building strategic networks, and advocating for policies that enhance cross-border business. At CCPB, we believe in empowering our members with the tools and connections they need to thrive in today’s dynamic global markets, while also promoting a spirit of cooperation and cultural exchange that strengthens bilateral relations.

MembershipPage.Title: Membership
MembershipPage.Desc0: Join CCPB: A Community of Opportunity and Growth
MembershipPage.Desc1: Membership with the Chamber of Commerce Portugal-Bangladesh (CCPB) is open to:
MembershipPage.Desc2: Individuals: Portuguese and Bangladeshi professionals engaged in business activities linked to Portugal and Bangladesh.
MembershipPage.Desc3: Legal Entities: Companies, organizations, and enterprises registered in either Portugal or Bangladesh and involved in business, manufacturing, or trade between the two countries.
MembershipPage.WhyBecomeMemberDesc: Our members are the backbone of CCPB, and we are committed to providing them with unparalleled value and support. By joining CCPB, you gain access to a thriving community, exclusive resources, and opportunities that propel your business forward.
MembershipPage.MembershipBenefitTitle: Membership Benefits of the Portugal-Bangladesh Chamber of Commerce (CCPB)
MembershipPage.MembershipBenefitDesc: Joining the CCPB Chamber of Commerce offers a wealth of advantages for companies aiming to strengthen their business presence and connections. Here are the key benefits members can enjoy
MembershipPage.MembershipBenefitsSummary: Join the CCPB Chamber of Commerce today and unlock unparalleled opportunities for business growth and success.

0.Title: Exclusive Invitations:
0.Desc: Attend CCPB-hosted business gs to foster connections and explore opportunities.

1.Title: Expanded Network:
1.Desc: Build valuable relationships with industry leaders, government officials, and international businesses.

0.Title: Sector Insights:
0.Desc: Gain access to critical information about specific industries to stay informed and competitive.

1.Title: Member Directory:
1.Desc: Receive a printed copy of the Member’s Directory, featuring essential contacts and profiles.

2.Title: Brand Exposure:
2.Desc: Your company logo will be featured on the CCPB website and in the Member’s Directory, enhancing visibility.

0.Title: Visa Assistance:
0.Desc: Receive Schengen visa support for members traveling to Portugal.

1.Title: Business Facilitation:
1.Desc: Participate in business luncheons with high-ranking government officials and ministers, easing access to key decision-makers.

2.Title: Priority Treatment:
2.Desc: Enjoy priority consideration for Portugal-based companies exploring opportunities in Bangladesh.

0.Title: Lobbying:
0.Desc: Benefit from CCPB’s lobbying efforts on behalf of its members to promote favorable policies and partnerships.

1.Title: Trade Shows and Gala Events:
1.Desc: Expand your market reach through trade shows and networking opportunities organized by CCPB.

NewsDetails.Title: News Title 1
NewsDetails.Content: The Inaugural Ceremony of the Portugal-Bangladesh Chamber of Commerce Held in Lisbon The grand inaugural ceremony of the newly formed Portugal-Bangladesh Chamber of Commerce was held in Lisbon, the capital of Portugal. The event took place (November 27) at 4:00 PM local time. In the opening speech, Abdul Ahad Salman, the Secretary-General of the Portugal-Bangladesh Chamber of Commerce, extended a warm welcome to the attendees. In his closing remarks, the President of the Chamber, Mohammad Jiban, thanked all the guests and urged them to continue their support.
